Source.Name: playonlinux
Source.Summary: PlayOnLinux is a piece of software which allows you to easily install and use numerous games and apps
Source.Description: PlayOnLinux is a piece of software which allows you to easily install and use numerous games and apps designed to run with Microsoft Windows.
